2.

```{r}
y <- data.frame(a = rnorm(100), b
= 1:100, cc = sample(letters, 100, replace = TRUE))

tail(y, n=10)
y[10:20, 1:3]
```

3.

```{r}
z <- c(1, 2, 3, NA, 4, NA, 5, NA)

z[!is.na(z)]

z_without_na <- z[!is.na(z)]

mean(z_without_na)

mean(z)

sum(z_without_na)/length(z)
```
